text: right across the board in every sector
imaginable industries are being
transformed and cloud is at the heart of
that change whether it's the unbundling
of financial services that are driving
new services of consumers or
manufacturers using new methods like 3d
printing to improve production time and
cost or machine learning being deployed
into healthcare to help diagnose
symptoms or even discover new drugs I'm
Gavin Jackson I'm the managing director
for Amazon Web Services in the UK and
Ireland the transformation day is an
event for senior leaders who want to
understand more about how they can use
the cloud to drive more innovation
you'll hear from industry peers as well
as AWS experts and you'll be offered
some best practices to take back and
apply in your own teams it's also a
great opportunity to spend some time
getting to meet people that are just
like you who are searching for the
innovation accelerator within their
business I look forward to seeing you
there
[Music]
